data.metadata: {"description":"Becca's way has been full of great memories, which combine web3 journey (x.com) + IRL events, where you can be much more closer with like-minded builders/supporters. Keep growing and proliferating!"}

translation.translatedDescription: Becca's way has been full of great memories, which combine web3 journey (x.com) + IRL events, where you can be much more closer with like-minded builders/supporters. Keep growing and proliferating!

data.metadata: {"description":"Been talking with AL on his stream and seeing his pengu DCA makes me feel like I should have done it along with him since day 1.\n\nadding up as AL is a really kind, friendly, and care as he's treating everyone within the circle"}

translation.translatedDescription:
Been talking with AL on his stream and seeing his pengu DCA makes me feel like I should have done it along with him since day 1.

adding up as AL is a really kind, friendly, and care as he's treating everyone within the circle

data.metadata: {"description":"Silly Billy is a great example of the kind of member every community needs. He leads by example with a naturally positive and charismatic presence that makes his content both relatable and approachable. I‚Äôve truly enjoyed connecting with him through Abstract and our shared love for Pudgy Penguins. I‚Äôm hopeful we‚Äôll continue to grow our connection and maybe even collaborate on some educational content to support new users. I‚Äôm looking forward to the day we get to meet at an event in person."}

translation.translatedDescription: Silly Billy is a great example of the kind of member every community needs. He leads by example with a naturally positive and charismatic presence that makes his content both relatable and approachable. I‚Äôve truly enjoyed connecting with him through Abstract and our shared love for Pudgy Penguins. I‚Äôm hopeful we‚Äôll continue to grow our connection and maybe even collaborate on some educational content to support new users. I‚Äôm looking forward to the day we get to meet at an event in person.

data.metadata: {"description":"Guezit0 was one of the first truly impactful voices in the Abstract Discord. Their ability to curate content from multiple sources and organize it for mass consumption made learning a new blockchain feel effortless! Guezit0 and Aiz have my utmost respect as they were instrumental in quickly bringing the Giga Chads up to speed."}

translation.translatedDescription: Guezit0 was one of the first truly impactful voices in the Abstract Discord. Their ability to curate content from multiple sources and organize it for mass consumption made learning a new blockchain feel effortless! Guezit0 and Aiz have my utmost respect as they were instrumental in quickly bringing the Giga Chads up to speed.

data.metadata: {"description":"Aliru is one of true chad who solely contribute to Abstract and ecosystem. I personally get to know him recently and I can feel his dedication and honest toward his work\n\ngiga support giga and thats why I just feel like I need to drop him a review just like how I did with others within Abstract community"}

Aliru is one of true chad who solely contribute to Abstract and ecosystem. I personally get to know him recently and I can feel his dedication and honest toward his work

giga support giga and thats why I just feel like I need to drop him a review just like how I did with others within Abstract community

data.comment: Giga artist to Abstract and Pudgy
data.metadata: {"description":"One of us huddle, and those high-quality artists are what defined Pavil as I didn't get to directly interact much, but from what I personally see, his inclusion and effort to the ecosystem are next level of contribution"}

translation.translatedContent: Giga artist to Abstract and Pudgy
translation.translatedDescription: One of us huddle, and those high-quality artists are what defined Pavil as I didn't get to directly interact much, but from what I personally see, his inclusion and effort to the ecosystem are next level of contribution

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x0e3274FEa64567fdA14187c89B08f61048F4d45a

translation.translatedDescription:
If I ever get to refer to something that determines Abschud, It would probably be good cop & bad cop play where on the surface he might looks really aggresive to how he handles stuff and moderates community on Abstract

While I get to know him more from another angle, his real intention is to shape the community into a solid, supportive, and zero-farmer community 

On the other side, he'll be willing to support and lend a hand to us people where we never expect it to be which most of people won't get to notice

data.author: 0x7688cB0AcA3740B723495C9b640Fb479E983924c
data.subject: 0x25954Fb49bFc6A2A09770be5CCA756c8676F31ba
data.comment: A Breath of Cheerfulness and Penguin Cuteness
data.metadata: {"description":"Becca‚Äôs been a top-tier believer in the penguin huddle since day one. She went from dropping consistent, high-quality content around Pudgy Penguins and Abstract to actually joining the PP team to help with community + events.\nShe brings energy and positivity, to the ecosystem, which isn't common in a market like ours.\nA great journey for a great penguin."}

translation.translatedContent: A Breath of Cheerfulness and Penguin Cuteness
translation.translatedDescription:
Becca‚Äôs been a top-tier believer in the penguin huddle since day one. She went from dropping consistent, high-quality content around Pudgy Penguins and Abstract to actually joining the PP team to help with community + events.
She brings energy and positivity, to the ecosystem, which isn't common in a market like ours.
A great journey for a great penguin.

data.author: 0x73Cd95dd1063Caa7899FcB24FC3E44DA74AC8dFC
data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966
data.metadata: {"description":"Sillybilly is one of the most active member on Abstractchain, he drops ecosystem updates daily and he's been doing this for about 10 months or even above. A real consistent chad and he's made his way to the top."}

translation.translatedDescription: Sillybilly is one of the most active member on Abstractchain, he drops ecosystem updates daily and he's been doing this for about 10 months or even above. A real consistent chad and he's made his way to the top.

data.author: 0xeA43D9d2b85a363d8e760F936b05978B853F24c4
data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966
data.metadata: {"description":"Not sure that i can find out any other account where so much alpha about Abstract ecosystem. Can't say that we interact so much, but his weekly updates, highlights. Appreciate you for what you are doing."}

translation.translatedDescription: I'm not sure I can find any other account with so much alpha about the Abstract ecosystem. I can't say that we interact that much, but his weekly updates and highlights are great. I appreciate you for what you are doing.

data.metadata: {"description":"One of a few Pudgy Penguin's OGs that I know who truly contribute to both Pudgy Penguin and Abstract ecosystems\n\nHis recent AI video creation featuring Pudgy Penguin and Opensea is truly cinematic high quality work"}

One of a few Pudgy Penguin's OGs that I know who truly contribute to both Pudgy Penguin and Abstract ecosystems

data.author: 0xeA43D9d2b85a363d8e760F936b05978B853F24c4
data.subject: 0x25954Fb49bFc6A2A09770be5CCA756c8676F31ba
data.metadata:
{"description":"Becca as massive part of my web3 friends been met in huddle. So proud to see her way in space & in PP community. She is proliferating Penguins everywhere, as across socials + on IRL events, support local communities & one of the most important that she is staying positive! 

Keep smiling and growing Becca. 
Your legendary lil with rice hat on one of me street arts!

Pudgy once - Pudgy forever!"}

translation.translatedDescription:
Becca as massive part of my web3 friends been met in huddle. So proud to see her way in space & in PP community. She is proliferating Penguins everywhere, as across socials + on IRL events, support local communities & one of the most important that she is staying positive! 

Keep smiling and growing Becca. 
Your legendary lil with rice hat on one of me street arts!

Pudgy once - Pudgy forever!

data.author: 0xa48FeDBaCaBfa7fb70e9F3ae420Ded49583f30a3
data.subject: 0x2CCFF304eF578B238eE82E1D1d53c34e80B48ad6
data.metadata: {"description":"AL has been part of Abstract since pre-mainnet and has been a breath of fresh air to the ecosystem. OG Pudgy member, very honest, wants to see everyone succeed and adds a lot of value to conversations and especially Spaces."}

translation.translatedDescription: AL has been part of Abstract since pre-mainnet and has been a breath of fresh air to the ecosystem. OG Pudgy member, very honest, wants to see everyone succeed and adds a lot of value to conversations and especially Spaces.

data.subject: 0x607d2381aFecbD80c4AD5CCE8059205C2a297966
data.metadata: {"description":"Sillybilly is an absolute community beast with with high activity and commitment to Abstract. A true exemplar of what an Abstract Gigachad should be! Recommended follow! He is writing daily and weekly summaries of what is going on with the Abstract eco. Good reads."}

translation.translatedDescription: Sillybilly is an absolute community beast with with high activity and commitment to Abstract. A true exemplar of what an Abstract Gigachad should be! Recommended follow! He is writing daily and weekly summaries of what is going on with the Abstract eco. Good reads.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x617eCD09885BBe66330B1b7941463c2f98aA983b
data.metadata: {"description":"knowing Vitlus from early Abstract Day 1 and how he truly stands out and represent Ruyui as one of the guardians\n\nI would say that Vitlus deserves the endorsement through all his contribution and belief in this green consumer chain"}

knowing Vitlus from early Abstract Day 1 and how he truly stands out and represent Ruyui as one of the guardians

data.subject: 0xE33aa354FC16DC1D9f7d40EB54ED8374029F105B
data.metadata: {"description":"When there are only a few handful of believers on Abstract, Yot is one of us who show his belief by building NFT Project named Fugz which is now a part of the top NFTs on Abstract"}

translation.translatedDescription: When there are only a few handful of believers on Abstract, Yot is one of us who show his belief by building NFT Project named Fugz which is now a part of the top NFTs on Abstract

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0xfE87E06aC8DF906384731766f5e8CCA39E9817C4
data.metadata: {"description":"Intelligency is one of the believers who'd been with us since way before mainnet was live, which I saw his conviction through the Fugz community\n\nTo believe in an NFT project, PFP it up, contribute to Abstract, and the ecosystem can be rarely seen, which I am truly happy to see him among the community."}

translation.translatedDescription:
Intelligency is one of the believers who'd been with us since way before mainnet was live, which I saw his conviction through the Fugz community

To believe in an NFT project, PFP it up, contribute to Abstract, and the ecosystem can be rarely seen, which I am truly happy to see him among the community.

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
data.metadata: {"description":"Jaikens is one of the very few team members who has been there with us since Day 1 to support and moderate all kinds of stuff in Abstract Discord along with Cure.\n\nSeeing him since then, getting to talk from time to time, and how he's always here with us make me feel like this guy is one of us believers"}

translation.translatedDescription:
Jaikens is one of the very few team members who has been there with us since Day 1 to support and moderate all kinds of stuff in Abstract Discord along with Cure.

Seeing him since then, getting to talk from time to time, and how he's always here with us make me feel like this guy is one of us believers

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x1d5a19b4E2c95B07dC7B9380aFfF85e477d5AEfc
data.metadata: {"description":"been knowing Feral way before Abstract with how he utilized pudgy penguin IP to his work that really stands out from others until he joined AP Collective team\n\nAfter I knew he's a part of Fugz NFT as a creative lead, I would say that Fugz really got a gem and truly happy for Feral"}

translation.translatedDescription:
been knowing Feral way before Abstract with how he utilized pudgy penguin IP to his work that really stands out from others until he joined AP Collective team

After I knew he's a part of Fugz NFT as a creative lead, I would say that Fugz really got a gem and truly happy for Feral

data.author: 0xc5c1e47208a5f2191B645084C896347229c5B306
data.subject: 0x83be849f0f51D23F17e49838f2811E3178226d6a
data.metadata: {"description":"Been knowing Cos since we got to be in the same gigachad promotion batch, and Cos is the 1st guy to follow me on X among the whole, which leads me to know that he‚Äôs a dev & cofounder of Blever\n\nOne of a few who truly believe in green consumer chain and build one of the NFT launchpads on Abstract"}

translation.translatedDescription:
Been knowing Cos since we got to be in the same gigachad promotion batch, and Cos is the 1st guy to follow me on X among the whole, which leads me to know that he‚Äôs a dev & cofounder of Blever

One of a few who truly believe in green consumer chain and build one of the NFT launchpads on Abstract

data.author: 0x36FA3AA384dD8Bcbb65DECa6E6ddE381F0e4392B
data.subject: 0xc820233ccBCB9a094f09fd4073364562C8D51cC0
data.metadata: {"description":"I feel both grateful and genuinely happy seeing my OG friends succeed, keep showing up for others, and help whenever and however they can. Every day, he supports and uplifts the space, always finding ways to push things forward."}

translation.translatedDescription: I feel both grateful and genuinely happy seeing my OG friends succeed, keep showing up for others, and help whenever and however they can. Every day, he supports and uplifts the space, always finding ways to push things forward.
